HEADER.TEXT: I thrive on creativity, embrace challenges, and am meticulously attentive to details, ensuring every project I work on is not only functional but also beautifully crafted.

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_1: I'm a Frontend Developer with 2 years of experience, specializing in Angular and TypeScript, based in São Paulo, Brazil. My expertise lies in prototyping and developing responsive and interactive web applications using a stack that includes HTML, CSS, SASS, Tailwind, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, and Figma.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_2: I place a strong emphasis on collaboration, actively contributing innovative ideas in web development. Beyond my professional endeavors, I maintain a proactive approach, eagerly offering technical insights and suggestions that enhance project outcomes.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_3: Outside of work, I remain dedicated to exploring the latest trends and advancements in Frontend development, continuously honing my skills in Angular, TypeScript, UI libraries, best practices, and automated testing methodologies.

TOOLS.TITLE: Tools I use
TOOLS.TEXT: Here are some awesome tools I use to make development and problem solving easier and faster for my user.

STREAMING.NAME: Streaming Platform
STREAMING.ABOUT: This project is a streaming platform developed using Angular, consuming The Movie DB API, designed to provide a responsive experience on mobile devices and iPads. The main focus was on TypeScript for safer and scalable code, utilizing SCSS for styling, and applying best development practices.

POKEMON.NAME: Pokémon Deck Builder
POKEMON.ABOUT: Responsive application developed using Angular 16+, Tailwind CSS, and the Infragistics UI library. The application allows players to build card decks using the Pokémon TCG API.

CONTACT.TITLE: Get in touch
CONTACT.TEXT: Have a project in mind? Looking to partner or work together? Reach out through the form and I'll get back to you in the next 48 hours.
CONTACT.FORM_MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Tell me a bit more what you are looking for...
